title: Distributed Denial of Service
summary: A Distributed Denial-of-Service (DDoS) is an attack in which many compromised systems are made to attack a single target, in order to swamp server resources and block legitimate users.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
